website_summaries.verdict: Soft-sided pet playpen that keeps animals safe indoors or outdoors. Uses lightweight materials for portability.
pros: Unit contains a zippered top to prevent pets from jumping out and to provide shade from the sun
Sets up quickly wherever it's needed
Available in 3 different coverage areas for use with different sizes of pets
cons: Not good for larger animals that may tip it over

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Enclosure
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought the small one for our 4 month old kitten to keep her activity low after her being spayed. Then we bought the large one a month later after our kitten had a case of diarrhea for a week. We ended up putting them together and using the small one for her litter box. They are pretty sturdy and our cat loves them. Although the top must be on or she can easily jump out. I would definitely recommend this enclosure.
customer_reviews.author: Destyni

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this! I wanted something enclosed and comfortable for my 50 lb pit mix to spend time in after knee surgery. It's much larger than I expected (I purchased the large), nice colors, easy to assemble. Easily fits my dog, his orthopedic bed, some pillows, and blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of ZoomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My 2 New Kittens give 5 Stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: We recently added too little fur babies to our home. The kittens absolutely adore it and so I happily give it 5 Stars! I love how the top and door unzips so there is a lot of versatility to this carrier/bed. You can unzip the top so you can put them in and pet them from above. And I love that the little 'door' can be rolled up and velcro held so they can freely walk in and out. It's extremely light and portable so you can take it with you and your little ones will feel right at home. Just add their favorite blankets and they will happily stay in it. I'm extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Great portable play pin
customer_reviews.text: I really love this portable play pin. I took it camping and both of my dogs fit in well. One is a 14 lb poodle mix & the other is a 10lb yorkie. I even use it inside my house and my dogs will sleep in it or even play inside. Its worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Super large, light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this, very light weight, folds up small. Ample size inside. Enough to fit my 13-year old 5-foot tall son in it if he curls up like a ball! Collapses easily, cat loves it. There is a large zippered flap on top that is removable, and then a zippered door on the side. My only complaint is that there is too much fabric and not enough screen. Why do they need so much opaque fabric on the sides at the top and bottom? The whole point is to be outside, it would seem that the more screened area the better.
customer_reviews.author: JKT

customer_reviews.title: Strong plastic/chemical smell is overpowering!!
customer_reviews.text: This playpen arrived today. Nice product seems to be well made. But frankly the chemical/plastic smell is so overwhelming I will be tossing it out once I purchase a replacement. I hope this doesn't make my puppy sick. Really where was this thing manufactured? This needs to be corrected immediately. So those of you that are considering purchasing this item contact the manufacturer to see if they are correcting this issue. Next time I'll purchase a metal crate, lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Material!!
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews before buying one! THIS IS HEAVY DUTY MATERIAL!! I got this one and the material is extra heavy duty. I was surprised how strong it is. My cat cannot rip it or rip through it. I am quite impressed at the strength of the material. I would recommend this to anyone for any animal. It is not a high but I use it for my cat and do not need a high one. It is 16 inches high by 27 inches wide which is plenty big for my cat in the garden!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Maliawco

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, especially for the price. The large size playpen is very roomy for my 14 lb miniature schnauzer. It is extremely easy to put up and down. The bottom is a tent like material so it is very easy to clean if your pet makes a mess. Just remember to zip the top on if you want your dog secure because it is very easy to get out of otherwise. Overall I definitely recommend this product. ***Update: My dog learned how to flip the playpen upside down. Which when I have a bowl of water in there can be a problem. So depending on how ingenuitive your dog is you may want to take this into consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Ky Lauren

customer_reviews.title: We love it! And So does Gizmo
customer_reviews.text: Our picky "I don't like anything" Chihuahua seems to actually like this. Gizmo is 7lbs... his favorite bed fits In here with a water bowl and room for a food bow also. We bring it upstairs and downstairs and we travel with (it folds so nicely and compact) It is nice and sturdy and we Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY disappointed in this playpen. The first time I tried to zip it up the zipper does not work. It seems to be made well other than that. It's useless to me without a zipper that works.
customer_reviews.author: C.J. Berscheidt

customer_reviews.title: A must have for Pet Owners
customer_reviews.text: Love this cat play pen. I have three now. One set up for each of my kitties and I cover it with a sheet and they hang out there all day. It is like camping for kitties. I have one that I keep folded up incase of emergencies. If you have to evacuate immediately, for example during an earthquake, it is a great safe way to keep your pets with you. It is big enough to fit a little litter box and a cat bed. A must have. Plus cats love to play in them.
customer_reviews.author: Nickal16

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and very unsafe—don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The reviews of this pet pen our prove to me that most Amazon reviews are fake. The fact that anybody would call this Item “sturdy” shows that reviews are fabricated. This is flimsy beyond belief. The material is a cheap nylon and the metal frame is so flimsy and bent strangely I can’t even get it to pop open. No pet would be safe in this, because the metal frame can’t hold its shape and it would collapse in easily on the animal inside, possibly hurting them. For your pet’s safety, get a better pet pen then this horrible piece of junk. I have several in different sizes that work well so keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of Swords

customer_reviews.title: KEEP THOSE KITTIES CORRALLED
customer_reviews.text: My 11 month old adoptive cat decided to fool me and got outside and found a boyfriend, or two, maybe three. Anyway, yep she got pregnantized and needing something to contain the new family I purchased this item. Having been involved with birthing and kittens many times before but having a garage or laundry room for them to grow up in was fine, this time I didn't so up went the playpen in my home office. This thing worked great and I mean great. Sturdy, roomy, easily accessible for momma kitty and kept the kids from escaping until 6 wks old. After that all hell broke loose. Love my kittens and this pen.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Ugh! NOT for Medium Breed dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I almost give this product 2 stars for being made well in some respects. If instance the zippers are holding up nicely and well placed. However, this thing has been knocked over about 100x by now. This has posed a danger to the puppies and has made my life harder then it needed to be! Also, the puppies have figure out they can eat the bottom out of it! At this point, I have it wedged between walls and furniture to keep it upright and that barley works! Wish I chose something else. Maybe if I had a small breed and had it tethered to the ground it may work out.
customer_reviews.author: Momma D

customer_reviews.title: Dog Approved
customer_reviews.text: I teach (spec ed pre k) and my dachshund is a certified therapy dog that comes to work with me. I needed a way to give her a quiet place to relax since I have a more active group this year. This has been perfect as it gives the children a visual boundary and she can come and go as she pleases. I have not needed to use the top but it's nice option. The pen folds flat so it stores under my desk when not in use. I know she feels secure in there as she falls asleep quite soundly in the afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: M.J. Fio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome product and seller. We bought this playpen for our Shih-Tzu. If you have a Shih-Tzu, you know very well how "under foot" they are - always right at your feet and sometimes you just want to get something done and not have to deal with the dog. This playpen is perfect for just that! We put a blanket in it and she's perfectly content to curl up and wait until we let her out. I was skeptical that it would ever fold back up the way it unfolds - but every time it's super easy to fold in just seconds. Really cool product - great seller with prompt shipping and good communications. Full 5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: Dave from Tacoma

customer_reviews.title: The answer for traveling with your pet!
customer_reviews.text: We were traveling with a new pet and didn't want her to be confined in a carrying tote while we traveled for several hundred miles. This great playpen allowed her to see wheat was going on and walk around and nap when she pleased. We found a great round cushion that was a perfect size. It's especially nice because it folds up to practically nothing so we can keep it handy and use it again when we take long trips and take her with us. Our pet was an adult cat. This was the answer we were looking for. It's tall enough that it doesn't encumber her in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Janwag

customer_reviews.title: Best hiding spot when visitors come over or a postman ...
customer_reviews.text: We got the large size... more space and can make it hos/her own bed/hang out place! Our pug loves it!!!! Best hiding spot when visitors come over or a postman knocks on the door! So nice, stable & affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: The girls (my dachshunds) love going in and out and playing in it
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th purchase of a portable playpen and I give them as gifts as well..The girls (my dachshunds) love going in and out and playing in it..I place a blanket they love inside..its so easy to take outside and bring back in...We collapse it to take it with us on trips out of town so that when we stay in a hotel...we set it up and the girls have a familiar piece of home to play in...They are great...This one is particularly appealing as it is not too small and not too big...Recommend highly...
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: It makes the perfect little chick brooder for 3-10 baby chickens!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to raise just a few "backyard chickens" as pets and for fun, this actually makes a perfect brooder! I've got 3 happy chicks in their little chick "nursery." Note: I would NOT use it (at least without a lot of caution) with a heat lamp set up. I'm using a homemade "momma cave" heated area (using a heating pad) for the chicks to sleep in, and they are indoors in a climate controlled situation at this time so intense heat is not needed. Google for "sweeter heater" or "brooder heating plate" for some other safe options. My chicks review: "Peep peep!"
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose pet playpen
customer_reviews.text: I love this playpen! We have a 19yr old weiner dog and we used to just put her in the bathroom when we away, because of her incontinence. We now put this in one of our spare rooms, put down a washable pee-pad and blanket, and it is great! She can be in an area that is open, and when she has an accident, we just take the playpen outside and wash it down with a hose. It's super light-weight, and dries quickly. We ended up getting the larger one, just so she would have room to walk around . . .
customer_reviews.author: L&S

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thinking I would use it to keep an eye on my puppy while I was busy with house work, gardening and etc. let me tell you, this is probably one of the best purchases I've made for our new puppy. We are pad training since we travel a lot, and her pad and pad holder fit perfect inside. I love that the door can be rolled up so she can go in and out easily. In the mornings when I know she has to go, but she's too excited to focus, I can close the door and give her the time she needs. easily folds up and easy to take with us.
customer_reviews.author: Net Girl

customer_reviews.title: Zippers are total junk
customer_reviews.text: The first one of these I received had the tag for a large, but it was actually a medium. The second had a defective zipper for the top so there were gaps despite trying to zip it as slowly as possible. The third had 1 defective zipper on the front upon delivery, and now the second zipper has totally failed after less than 10 uses. After 3 failures, I DO NOT recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Ktjmac

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper before 1st use
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I got this for 3 foster kittens I just rescued from the shelter. I have a leg with a cast and not mobile. I went to zip the top and the zipper is busted. I didnt get to use it once. I already dropped the box in the recycler. Now I have to find someone to take me to drop this off a d get a box. Major let down
customer_reviews.author: Stephy

customer_reviews.title: Durability and function
customer_reviews.text: I had the choice of several brands of play pens, and I am glad to have selected this one. It is very durable- I know because my puppy likes to chew on it and he has yet to destroy it! I like the fact that the floor does not zip out. That way he cannot escape out of it should he figure out the zipper. I just keep puppy pad in the pen in case of an accident. I also think the zip off top is very nice because it shades part of the interior. All the zippers are high quality and will last. Overall a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Unit Came as a Used Product
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars, I would have. Playpen arrived in used condition. (Is this normal?) Very disappointed because the other reviews were glowing. We were looking forward to getting a stellar play area for family cat. The smell the playpen gave off was similar to our local animal shelter. It did not come in the original box and arrived dirty with multiple scratches so apparently, not a brand new unit. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Katie H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cat camping!
customer_reviews.text: The size small is perfect for us! Our cat goes with us in our 28 ft camper. This will allow us to have her outside with us. I did put it outside on our screened porch when it came since it has that new product chemical sort of smell. She walked right in to check it out. Plenty big enough for 11 lb cat to lounge in and walk around. It has tabs to spike it down. So easy to open and fold away, weighs very little. Pewrfect!!! Just a note as well...this isn't for rambunctious puppies, etc. And, I wouldn't leave any animal unattended in it. It is light weight but well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nonstopmom

customer_reviews.title: This kind of thing is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I never knew that something like this was made until I came across one, looking for something to try and keep a kitten safe/have her own home while she gets older. She was a kitten we saved during a storm and extremely malnourished, so we couldn't really let her roam with my other two cats not knowing her. So this was the perfect find! It folds out and snaps into place easily, and folds back up easily. It's very durable, except the bottom side does not seem as strong as the rest of the product. Overall I would highly recommend this product. You can definitely get creative with them and other items or multiples.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E.

customer_reviews.title: Good for chickens
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my chickens as a brooder while the coop is being built. Very pleased with it. The liner is fraying a bit down the center but it may be from them scratching which they do a lot. I only intended to use it for them this once. But very please with it as my chicks are so happy with all their new space. I have 4 chicks and got the large tent. Love that the top unzips and the little door on the side for them to come out.
customer_reviews.author: Deb R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Chihuahua!
customer_reviews.text: This Portable Foldable Playpen for my 9 lb Chihuahua is absolutely perfect!!! He loves to sleep in it and feels safe in it when we have company, which is when he gets anxiety. It is the perfect size for him and he can see everything that is going on through the screen on the sides and top. Also it is very portable, you can fold it in seconds to take it with you when visiting others. This product is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline W

customer_reviews.title: Built well and with quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Maine coon for taking picnics and but still having a safe place to run into in case theres dogs out. I have to admit I was pretty amazed with the quality and stitching of this when I received it. I also love how easy I can fold and unfold it along with the awesome collapsible bowl! I bought the medium size and think it’s perfect space for a small travel litter box, and a food and water bowl. Definitely excited for new adventures
customer_reviews.author: Jerrika

customer_reviews.title: This portable pet pen is terrific. Even though it's set up in the house
customer_reviews.text: This portable pet pen is terrific. Even though it's set up in the house, he still goes in it, sometimes taking a toy with him. I take kitty outside in it and set it on a round patio table and he enjoys being able to see the outdoors (hear all the birds and everything), even as an otherwise strictly indoor cat.
customer_reviews.author: NYC

customer_reviews.title: Chicken approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to brood my baby chicks and ducklings in. Works well for the chicks but don’t recommend for ducks because they get so big so fast. I only had 5 chicks and ducklings in total so at first the small was a great size but when my ducklings tripled in size in two weeks I got cramped. If you are housing a different animal in it like a kitten or puppy I would definitely get the bigger size depending on how long you are keeping them in it. However chicken approved. Great for 4-6 chicks or one broody chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Seems to be really great quality and you just unfold it to set it up. Jennifer is having a blast with her toys and has plenty of space to play.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect option! It's small enough to fit in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend, who is a small dog owner. His dog just had 3 puppies, and he needed somewhere to keep the mom and puppies contained at night. This was the perfect option! It's small enough to fit in the corner of a room, but big enough to where puppies and mom have room to walk around. Part of the playpen is used for a "bed" area, one part for potty pads, and one part for food and water. The best part is that it folds down flat, for quick storage during the day. The sides are tall, so it's not easy for a small dog to escape, and the bottom wipes clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Scott

customer_reviews.title: Collapsable!
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute. Better looking in person than on the picture. I would have given it 5 stars but for one reason. My small dog got in and jump around and the entire playpen folded up on him! Of course he was not harmed in any way. It's very soft and cozy but the incident was a surprise and I laughed because I was home and able to help him get out and pop it back up....but if I had not been home to know this would happen it would have not been funny at all. I would recommend it...just be very cautious with enclosing your pet inside while away from home.
customer_reviews.author: Nioji

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for KITTEN
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kitten when I have to leave him unattended. Very roomy, fits a cave bed, food and water dishes, a litter box area (I use puppy pads or paper towel), with plenty of room to romp and play with toys. The sides are heavy canvas and durable screen, but the floor is vinyl so it is extremely easy to wipe up messes and disinfect.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The large on is really large and that’s a good thing because it’s a “true description”. I plan on putting baby chicks in it for the first use. The playpen comes with a pretty STRONG smell and I’ll have to leave it outside for a of couple days to see if it helps. Aside from that construction seems sturdy. Wish there were more options of colors, the brown is pretty ugly lol.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction but good size.
customer_reviews.text: We only my use this once a week when cleaning our guinea pig's cage. The top zipper on the cover broke the second time we used it. The pen is big enough but the construction is poor at best.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Used as a chicken brooder
customer_reviews.text: I definitely did not use this product as directed, but I would recommend them for chickens! I didn't want to invest in an expensive or giant brooder for chickens that would grow out of them within a few weeks. I ended up with 3 of these in my garage with about 10-12 chicks in each one and they worked perfectly. The zip top cover was perfect for keeping the chicks from jumping out, but was also super easy to open to feed and water them. I scrubbed and hosed them down a couple times each week and they held up fairly well. Definitely got some wear and tear, but worth the money for sure compared to other brooder set ups.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay B

customer_reviews.title: A little too good at folding up
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to corral four small foster kittens. The fact that it has a zippered top and a zippered side panel is essential. It is very easy to set up and take down, but not easy to clean. The kittens spill food or litter inside and we vacuum it out at least twice a day. However, it's difficult to clean the "floor" of the pen. Food and litter also get stuck in the seams at the bottom. The cats also like to jump on it and play on the "roof" when they are not inside. It then collapses on whatever is inside and makes a mess. It's a very good concept, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Good till 5 years kitten
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my four kittens to keep them there so they don’t roam around the whole house but it worked good for the Initial days but then once the kitten Gorky through the 4-5 weeks they were continuously scratching the nets which caused it to tear down also the nets are poor they don’t hold it’s fair if you want this for kittens less then 5 weeks but then it just can’t hold after that
customer_reviews.author: izan

customer_reviews.title: Very durable playpen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new puppy. I've had issues with durability in the past, but this playpen is the best one so far. The mesh is thick and he can't paw his way through it or tear it. I did notice a few marks on the inside of the pen when I first received, but that could be from shipping. There's a tag in there that your dog can bite on and pull, and it will pull in one of the sides. So I suggest you cut it off. So far we've had this for 2 days and he loves it. It hasn't collapse on him or anything. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Love the playpen but......
customer_reviews.text: I absolute love this pop up playpen. I purchased a small for my puppy to have at home and to take to visit family who have pets. There are a few things that I am not thrilled about the playpen, 1 the zipper on the top does not stay zipped and it starts to separate at the beginning, 2 the playpen is not stable at all it slides all over the floor 3. Put Pee pads on the floor and they slide all over inside.... I think this is only useful when you pet had surgery.. I am going to try it on a park outing and see if that is any better than inside the house....
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy, and portable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to shelter our small dog when traveling and not knowing in advance where we could confine him when needed. It was light and compact and fit easily into our vehicle without crowding out other luggage. It came with a pop up bowl which was nice and also saved space. Our small dog learned to escape by jumping the sides so we had to zip the top to keep him confined when needed. At first we thought we wouldn't like to use the top but it save him from running into unknown territory. I would recommend to anyone interested in a small pet shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to help contain our little Maltese in hotel rooms while traveling. She has a “condo” (pen) at home where she feels safe, so we wanted to find something more portable for traveling. This was PERFECT!! When folded, it takes up very little space, and it comes with a handy carrying case! We introduced her to it at home before we left, and while we traveled she was very happy to sleep in her “vacation condo” in the hotel with us!! Very well made, easy to set up and easy to fold. VERY happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Pet Playpen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our two 5wk old kittens in lieu of a cage while they were being house-trained / acclimated to their new home it was big enough for them to wrestle in (which is a fav passtime ) it accommodate s the two of them a water and food dish and a small litter box while they don't love being restricted it serves the purpose was easy to clean when there were accidents dried quickly and they love to take naps on top of or inside if it or just bounce on it like a trampoline took mere seconds to set up a great purchase overall
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This tent is perfect. We needed a place for our cat to sleep when we have guests over so she won't be able to hit us in our sleep. We got the biggest size and it easily fits food, water, little bed, and litterbox so she stays there for the night. She generally doesn't mind, but the few times she's tried to bust out of it, she wasn't able to. It really is more durable than I was expecting with pretty thick canvas and coated mesh. It folds up nicely for storage and I love the collapsible bowl that comes with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great as a pen, but of course cat likes it anyway
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve know this would be totally useless to hold a 6-lb cat. It’s way too flimsy. Even with her bed, water bowl, and scratch pad inside, she easily flipped it over with one pounce against the wall. On the upside, it neatly collapsed into cubes when she wrecked it, which my other cat really enjoys playing in. So three stars for that I guess. The small size was ok for holding a small cat/kitten for a short time—as long as you have a way to tether it. Otherwise, you’ve paid $20 for a cat jack-in-the-box.
customer_reviews.author: rien

customer_reviews.title: Strong Unpleasant Smell Not Good for Kittens
customer_reviews.text: The playpen arrived quickly after placing my order. I was excited to use this for my 7 week old foster kittens. It was easy to unfold and set up. Unfortunately, it had a very strong pickle-like odor similar to formaldehyde that was both unpleasant and nauseating. I tried to air it out overnight, but the smell lingered on. My foster kittens just got over a cold so a playpen with an overwhelmingly strong smell was not ideal. I returned the playpen the next day. If it were not for the unpleasant smell, this product would have received 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Mom

customer_reviews.title: great for small kittens
customer_reviews.text: There is plenty of room in this 48" wide kitten playpen. I have 2 foster kittens, and there is enough room in here for their litter box, food, water, and bed with still enough room to move around. If you have more than 2, there's still enough room for a larger bed or larger litter box. I leave the zipper door open during the day so they can run around the living room, then zip them in at night where they're perfectly happy until morning. The product is well made. The seller was quick to deliver the product. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: skigirl63

customer_reviews.title: Small even for puppies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Shih Tzu puppies 3 to 4 weeks old that were escaping over the side of the box. They are on the move and were hanging ever the side and dropping themselves out. The playpen is really nice plenty of room for Mama and three pups to feed and nap. However the opening lip is very swallow and easier for the pups to escape. Zipping the door is fine but Mama cannot get out or in. Consider the next size up for puppy containment of small breeds. The canopy is great for outside time and protection from prey birds.
customer_reviews.author: RIOBABY3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, but smell is off-putting
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for keeping our bottle fed foster kittens contained. I also love that it comes with a collapsible food dish and carry case. The only reason I am not giving it 5 stars is because of the smell. It has a strong chemical odor (like a new tent or other outdoor fabric smell) when I first opened it. I hung it outside to air out for a day, them left it out in the basement for another day and in dissipated some, bit it still has made the room smell like it. I am keeping the area well ventilated so it does not bother the kittens' sensitive noses.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N

customer_reviews.title: If you have a aggressive chewer this might not be for you.
customer_reviews.text: I love the roominess of the product, I like that it has not only a zippered doorway, but also the whole top is zippered. I used this to house my 2-3 month old mini labradoodle at night as he was constantly chewing up my furniture when he awoke during the night, even with him having a TON of chew toys. It was perfect, until he discovered he could work it onto its side and CHEW A HOLE along the seam of the bottom! A older, more disciplined dog probably would be fine in this. If the bottom was made of a more durable material I would give this a solid 5 star though.
customer_reviews.author: RosieRose

customer_reviews.title: I was about to return it; but...
customer_reviews.text: I was about to return it due to the horrible smell; but my son told me to clean it with warm water and let it dry, as per the instructions that came with it. The horrible smell is gone. My kitty loves it. Very strong material. I don't have any complaints. My kitty is happy and I'm happy as well. Just followed the instructions that came with it. Just the right size. Enough space for his bed, his cat litter and toys. The side mesh are made with a strong material and the zippers are made with good quality materials. I do recommend to buy it for your kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Rosselis

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product, one of our rescue dogs whelped a litter of puppies in it and she seemed to like it. It's very cave-like and she never tried to move her puppies out of it, a problem we've had in the past with other dogs. As a professional dog rescue I highly recommend this product for whelpng & nursing puppies. If used with EZwhelp washable pads it is very easy keep clean. I recommend getting at least two pads so you can switch them out. It doesn't stand up to older large breed puppies over 6 weeks though but I'll definitely buy this again once we get set up to take in more pregnant dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Dullahan

customer_reviews.title: Good for social distance party . . .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to meet a new puppy . . . we met outside and they kept the puppy contained and shaded by putting her in the playpen. When they left, they took the playpen as our "new puppy" gift to them. It worked well, they report that it has been useful as a second place to keep puppy next to them while working at home. I am pleased with the purchase. It seems well made, including the zipper. I like that both the side and top can open and close. Will it last forever - no. But should last long enough for a puppy, and I was glad to get it so quickly and inexpensively when I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Cellomommy

customer_reviews.title: This has been a god send...
customer_reviews.text: As a foster for kittens this portable playpen has been a god send. Not only does it keep them safe and secure, theres plenty of room for them to have all that they need inside for the duration you have them in there when they're not romping around your home. The material is very durable, no rips or tears, no fraying, even the netting hasn't torn whatsoever. It pops open so you can do it with one hand should you be holding a kitten or other small animal in the other. It also comes with a very handy carrying bag AND a portable pop-up water dish! I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: What a life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Santa Claus brought my four kids two tiny kittens for Christmas this year!!! We are first time pet owners and were a little unprepared for this surprise!!! I quickly ordered this product because we had to corral these lil guys, and boy was it a life saver!!! My favorite part is that it collapses for storage; I can’t imagine having a kennel that would take up space when you’re not using it. We live in a small house!!! I will say, however, that this will definitely only work on young animals, because it’s not solid/sturdy enough for bulky/strong pets. This size was perfect for our two kittens.
customer_reviews.author: TrishaM

customer_reviews.title: First time item
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our newly adopted 3 yr old indoor cat. Never tried this type cat "play pen" before. We use it to let the cat have some fresh air on the deck and it is plenty big for her to pay with her toys while looking at nature. She is an 8 lb cat and we have had no problems with her trying to get out of the pen. Easy to unfold and fold up. Will use when visiting our daughter to keep the cat safe in a new environment and still have lots of room to move around. This was much better than I thought it might be for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Thinking Reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect playpen for my guinea pigs
customer_reviews.text: I use this playpen for my little pigs when I change their main cage. It is so easy to put up and I found a washable pee pad that fits it perfectly. When I travel to my vacation home this playpen goes with me and the pigs stay in it. It is made well and is so easy to fold up and put away. It was a bit challenging to figure out how to hang a water bottle on it but the mesh it very strong so I was able to make it work. My friend liked it so much that she wants one for her cat to use on her balcony. Great seller as well.
customer_reviews.author: CarolB

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use it for potty training so I couldn’t rate it but I think it would be good for Training. I use mine to break my pups from sleeping on the bed with me. My fur babies are 5 & 10. A friend used to bring over something like it and they would use hers so I decided to try it and they love it. All I have to say at bedtime is, “Let’s go in your tent” and in they go! I was shocked . It’s been great and I wish I had bought my own years ago. The price is right , & it’s soooo easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: DRL

customer_reviews.title: So Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fabulous. I needed something for my new franchise puppy when I work out so he doesn't try to climb onto my treadmill and hurt himself. This is so easy to use, just unfold it, it's small and compact and is the perfect size of him. I love that I can unzip the top and there is a little door. It also came with a carrying case to take it with me when I travel with him and a little foldable water cup. So cute! A great deal for the price and I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MizAlica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quarantine!
customer_reviews.text: Over the weekend, a 6 week old kitten just appeared in my yard, very sick. I was keeping her in a bathroom, but our home is too small to expect 5 people to all use one bathroom. This pen delivered today, and it is already perfect for keeping her quarantined until her antibiotics keep her from getting my 10 and 12 week olds sick. It fits her bed, a small litter box, and food/water, with some room to move around. The top zips off and there’s a little zipper door that can be held open with velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our dachshund. He’s injured his back and neck multiple times and isn’t a fan of the metal crate. We’ve been using a child’s pack n play during his episodes, but it’s clunky and tough to move around the house (living room to bedroom). This is sturdy, foldable, and lightweight. He goes right in through the door when you tell him “go to bed”, and no whining until you get up in the morning. His bed fits nicely, and during his episodes a blanket and potty pad fits. I like that it came with a top. For $22, it’s awesome. We got a small for him.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect playpen for our baby kitten
customer_reviews.text: This playpen is perfect for our kitten. The zippered top makes it easy to remove her things when needed and the zippered door is great for allowing her access to the "outside" when we are watching her. We purchased the medium size and her little bed, her litter box and her toys all fit without being crowded. We are very pleased with the quality, ease of use and ability to wipe clean when needed. We would buy this product again and highly recommend! The shipping was very fast and our baby kitty is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Clynn

customer_reviews.title: Great play area for my foster kittens and the price is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for the next size crate or play area for my foster kittens. The price is awesome. Fellow fosters these tents is awesome for cats to play in. I have neonatal bottle babies and to keep them in a safe place is very important. I have now all the the sizes s,m , and l, I start my kittens in a plastic box with a pillow and heaters and then I move up to let them stretch their legs and play. These clean well with odoban and a hose. Let dry in the sun and fold them up.
customer_reviews.author: Cherié

customer_reviews.title: We love it! We use it for our 8 pound ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We use it for our 8 pound Yorkie, she sits/lies in it while we are camping and I don't have to fear she has wandered off. She loves being outside with us.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Allard

customer_reviews.title: Decent Concept, Very Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to assemble and put away; the directions were simple and easy to follow. The design offers a lot of flexibility, but the material is very flimsy. If you have an active animal in there they definitely will test the integrity of it. I can see this being useful for extremely young animals, but not active kittens or puppies. The price isn't too bad, but that's because you're not really paying for much. I returned it to Amazon via Kohl's drop-off without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: My puppy can’t be trusted in this thing
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I bought 3 at once ( home , office and boyfriends house ). My 10 week old Pomeranian found a seam on the bottom Of one and created a hole on the floor so he could pop out and come from Underneath . Then he figured out SOMEHOW how to unzip the mesh door and simply walk out when he would like . Pretty creepy to wake up to a little Jingle bell( on his collar ) walking into a dark bedroom at night . This item is a cool concept but not reliable if a 10 week old puppy can get out
customer_reviews.author: msdstevens

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first puppy playpen but my first from this provider. I found this to be just as good as others I've had. I like them because the puppy doesn't feel too confined, as in a wire or molded plastic crate. My puppy is small and can tip this over and use it like a gerbil on a wheel while still confined until potty trained. That may not work for everyone. They do eventually split at the seams where the side and bottom meet but that would also depend on the dog and how much you use it. It's great as long as you know what to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a bed or safe space, under supervision
customer_reviews.text: Love this pop up crate for my newest rescue dog. She's very small, and has no teeth, so I made the mistake of using this instead of a wire crate the first time I had to leave her at home alone. She didn't escape or tear it, but she was able to use it essentially as a soft-sided hamster ball which was kinda funny but if her area wasn't also enclosed by a gate or if I'd have been gone longer she would have been at risk of hurting herself. We only got one use out of it as a crate alternative, but it works really well as bed for her to hide in at night in our room.
customer_reviews.author: Evemarie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. My wife and I found some very small kittens in our yard a few days ago. We decided to keep and raise them and wanted to get them a simple shelter to hide in and get out of the elements. This was perfect. We placed it on our porch upside down cause the top is a zip in mesh and the bottom is solid and will keep rain out. They started using it immediately. Even comes with a collapsible food/water bowl. Great product. Recieved it fast and very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Bowhunt220

customer_reviews.title: Perfect home for a new kitten
customer_reviews.text: No assembly required, just pull out the corners and it pops into shape. This was great for our new kitten while she was getting acclimated and while our other pets were getting used to her. She has "outgrown" her need for the playpen's security and now folds all the corners in on herself. We will soon be cleaning it out, folding it up and storing it in it's included storage bag. It is still in excellent shape, having held up from one very active kitten and 3 dogs.
customer_reviews.author: T Pray

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended pet playpen from very reliable source
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the Parkland Playpen, because I was adopting two kittens from a foster family, who dedicates their time to rescuing abandoned, feral born kittens. They TNR (trap neuter release) trying to assist in the overpopulation of cats in the streets. I wasn't sure that the room I was prepping for the kittens would be ready. In the end it was and I did not require the playpen. I can only say, they HIGHLY RECOMMENDED this playpen, for they and a many other foster/TNR families use it in their homes when new cats/kittens are rescued and love it.
customer_reviews.author: bohana

customer_reviews.title: and has even become a favorite play spot for our new cat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this on our vet's recommendation as a way to allow our old cat to safely interact with our new cat while they're getting to know one another (new cat goes inside with some distracting toys, old cat can come up and see/sniff her with a barrier). It works well for that purpose, and has even become a favorite play spot for our new cat, so we've left it out with the door open for both to use it when they want. Over time, it has had some trouble keeping it's shape, and we have to pop it back out every few days, but overall it's a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great for small puppies!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this playpen for my Pomeranian puppy to stay in when I'm not home and it is a perfect little "room" for her. Can't really leave her unattended or with my cats and dogs until she grows a bit more either so I thought a crate was my only option. Glad I came across this pen because it is much more comfy and spacious than a crate, fits all her amenities (food, toys, bed) and folds up quickly and easily for storage. Tip: If you expect to be gone long, line the floor of the pen with pee-pads in case your puppy has an accident.
customer_reviews.author: Albert S

customer_reviews.title: Parkland Pet Playpen, where have you been all my life?!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently fostered three little kittens that were so small they required bottle feeding. They were growing so quickly that I needed a way to "corral" them... this was the ideal solution! I really appreciate the two different openings and the screens all the way around. I was able to check on the sweet little kittens without disturbing them (kittens that small also require constant monitoring). Anyway, I would definitely recommend this to anyone with small pets that need to be kept in a small space. I wish I would have known about this years ago - it's truly perfect for when you spay/neuter a pet that you don't want jumping and running all over the place!
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for bringing kittens out to where the people are
customer_reviews.text: This was recommend for our kittens that we’re socializing. We’re very happy with it. Lots of room to play, litter pan & water (collapsible that came with) & couple of Amazon boxes to play in. Pen came in a carrying bag. Easy to assemble. Haven’t tried breaking it down yet. Kittens have climbed sides & dug on bottom but don’t see any snags yet. Downside is the top zipper only zips from one side but that’ll just take getting used to. We plan on using this when we travel & hope kittens use it even after they’re grown. Side note: we’ve renamed it Thunderdome after rounds of kitty wrestling.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfect for kittens
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 6 week old kitten to separate her from my 3 years old orange tabby who is 17 pounds. She stayed it in while we worked for about 2 weeks and we let her out at night. Perfect size for her cat bed, small litter box, pet food bowl and water dish. Easy to clean. Easy to zip. She didn't mind being in it and now she isn't in it anymore but probably will use it again soon when she gets fixed. Perfect for little kittens. Basically a play pen for cats. Also good for timeouts lol , bought the small size
customer_reviews.author: melinator85

customer_reviews.title: Look for another!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not well made not well throughout. The bottom is just nylon very thin and it is not protected. So when your puppy pisses in it, soaks straight through. The other one I have has a rubber coated removable bottom. The zippers on the product are very cheap not well made. When I compare this product with the other I have at the same price this on here falls very short! Very disappointed, I would return it if I still had the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking I could attach it to my larger pop up kennel for a separate area for a litter box. Not really sure what I was thinking because this kennel is shorter and the panels are more narrow than my large one. However, it is still a solidly made product and works exactly how I expected it to. Easy to fold up, easy to assemble, and it's a pretty sturdy product. I am not currently using this kennel, but it was too good of a deal for the quality to return and I'm keeping it for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Need to corral kittens? This is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend fostered seven kittens at once and needed something to keep the poop monsters from roaming the entire house until they learned what the litter box was for. This enclosure was recommended and it has been a great blessing. It is spacious enough that they can romp and get exercise, but it keeps them to one area and, most importantly, from pooping under every heavy object in the house. It was as it was pictured, arrived on time, and is durable enough for the job. I heartily recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best “cat pen” ever haha
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!!! I recently went on vacation and I had to take my cat who doesn’t travel well and this was the best solution! I put this in front of a bedroom door so he could come out to the living room if he wanted and then run back into the bedroom when he needed to feel safe. Works like a dream! A bit flimsy if your like me with a big ole but and knock into it. Lol Packs up easy and flat. I’m so glad I chose this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashalee

customer_reviews.title: Great for kittens
customer_reviews.text: This little tent was so easy to unfold. I had my tiny 4 week old kitten in there playing within minutes of it showing up. I put a blanket in the bottom, her little bed that's a cube, her food bowl, and some toys. She still has room to climb around. She has climbed up the sides with her claws and the material is holding up. The zippers are good material. She is FAST so I unzip the top halfway when she is whining to go potty or get out and play. It makes it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Wolk

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: A very strong chemical odor for the first few days out of the box. Air it out outside and not a huge problem. It’s the zippers that are a pain. Very cheap. The door one will unzip itself if enough pressure is put to it. We have to zip it one way then use the second zipper to get it to reattach. The top panel is the same and it’s stating point is opposite the door so you have to lean over the whole thing to work it. The pen also will collapse onto itself. I own two different pens that are way better quality that this one. Zippers work, two doors, stays standing up
customer_reviews.author: bill e o

customer_reviews.title: It worked for our short term need.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our rabbits to have secure play area at a show. It fit a small litter box and toys well plus the 2lb and 4lb bunnies. But it is small. Worked for our purpose. Was a little weird trying to fold back up and doesnt have a leak proof/resistant bottom, cheap nylon but worked for our weekend. Would recommwnd for small breed rabbit or guinea pig, maybe a chihuahua. But too small for much else. Thank you for free collapsible cup though!!
customer_reviews.author: Momto4nmore

customer_reviews.title: Great playpen!
customer_reviews.text: I just adopted two kittens and got the medium playpen. It is easy to assemble, just pop it out and zip the top on. It's the perfect place for them to sleep and have a safe hideaway spot. The medium is plenty big enough house two 12 week old kittens, some blankets, food and water dishes, and a small litter box. I really like that it is easy to move and that I can zip the top off to clean or add food, and zip it back on to enclose them at night. Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 36" and it seems well made and sturdy. The zip top is a nice feature to help place our cats (1 small and 2 larger) inside. It's airy and roomy. We bought this to help transport our cats in the back of the car during our upcoming move Right now, it's sitting in our family room and the cats love it. They go in on their own and sleep and play. They are acclimating to it very well. I don't regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly  S

customer_reviews.title: No hesitations--Buy today! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I bought two of these because my parents and I bought brother and sister puppies at the same time. Needed something small that wouldn’t take up a lot of space in the house. I got the small size for our puppies. My puppy is only a pound and will grow to be about 10 lbs. and I am sure he will continue to love his new “house”. It has a detachable “roof” for when your pup learns to jump out. It has a zip around doorway that can velcro to stay open. Easy to clean bottom in case of accidents. I just love this product! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Fukushima

customer_reviews.title: Great but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 10-week-old Yorkie. It's easy to use, lightweight, and can be moved easily from room to room. The problem is that it's cheap. Several edges of the inside material aren't finished, as if someone didn't finish the job. The material is so thin that it deteriorates when it gets wet, or when your dog chews on it for a while. Our puppy is almost 2 pounds, so if she can pull off the material, you know it's poorly made. Sadly, the product just isn't holding up as well as we'd hoped. We suggest spending a little more for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Seemed really durable at first.
customer_reviews.text: Great product concept, but the zipper stitching is weak and frays easily, as well as the bottom footing of the structural supports. It's repairable, but not eternally... When I bought this I wasn't expecting it to start getting ruined by 3 months despite my keeping it on smooth ground and somewhat padded. Cleanup can also be a bit of a trouble, since the sides don't allow for water to pass through easily. You have to take some preemptive measures to protect the fabric from sun and wear, because it's not been treated with a sealant or fixatiff and the fabric cuts due to the supports.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Super product, so far the best one we have purchased.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third different brand of this type of enclosure we have purchased. This is bigger than the others we have purchased but I believe this one beats the others in Quality. Very sturdy and the zippers very strong. We use it for 3 small dogs to sleep in at night. So far we love this product and I highly recommend it if your looking to buy. This is the biggest one for sale and just the right size for all three dogs to have plenty of room to settle down and sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item.y older dog is blind, or almost. I was getting the van ready for a camping trip and she was in there with me, just laying down. I turned my back for 1 second and she walked out of the van. Scared me really badly as she hurt foot. I realized I needed something to keep her contained occasionally during our camping trip. This is perfect! It folds for easy storage and when in use keeps her safe in those moments I need to focus in another direction.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pet playpen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to use as a playpen for my indoor rabbit to give her exercise time outside of her cage. This is the 4th item I tried, and it’s perfect! She can’t jump out of it, it’s easy to fold for moving, is easy to clean, and is sturdy and won’t fall apart. I bought a removable, washable pad for the bottom, as my bunny isn’t potty trained. I purchased a large (size), but if I were using it for a dog I would only put a small or medium size dog in it. I really love this pet playpen.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sauder

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for my Chihuahuas. My old dog took to it right away. But the puppy wasn't so sure about it. It took a couple of weeks of him watching the other one enjoy his time in the "puppy yurt" before he'd try his. Once in it, it was true love. He sleeps in there, plays in there, steals everything he can get a paw on and tries to hide it in there...everything. Now I always know where to look when something comes up missing.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mary

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful and easy to setup, but the bottom is a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help train a feral kitten I found. It's quite roomy, beautiful, and easy to assemble and move. I put him in it and he seemed happy. Later he had a little kitten tantrum and tried to claw his way out. I pulled him out and checked it to see if the pen was ok. It seems he managed to tear a hole in the bottom center and corners. I'm not sure this qualifies as a defect, but if a kitten and cut through it anything can. The bottom should really be made of the same material as the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Home away from home
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome place for our shihtzu when away from home. We set it up at home leaving the gate unzipped so he could come in and out we put his pillow and blankets in it. He went in it and snuggled up on his pillow. It was good to get him used to it before we went to visit family. It folds flat and small for ease while traveling. We have not had to use he detachable top as he is older and can't get out. It smells like home now and is a perfect home away from home. It is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyanne

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for a kitten I was hand raising
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for a kitten I was hand raising. About the time my kitten was 4 weeks and able to walk around quite a bit I moved him into this. It was great because he was able to walk around and climb without me wondering where he was going. I was able to put him, his food and water, and small litter box inside. It was very easy to wipe clean and packs away small and flat.
customer_reviews.author: LCFTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a playpen that we could keep our new puppy in while busy around the house and not have to worry about pet gates etc. We got the small version, and it is perfect. She is teething and chews away at the corners, tries to bite through the mesh, but so far it is holding up very well. Well made and well worth the price. She also likes to sleep in it at night, we have the zippered door furled open for her to come and go as she pleases for potty.
customer_reviews.author: GWL

product_meta.title: Parkland Pet Portable Foldable Playpen Exercise Kennel Dogs Cats Indoor/Outdoor Removable Mesh Shade Cover
feature_bullets: Keep your pets safe and secure both indoors and outdoors.
Sets up in seconds and requires no assembly; folds back flat when not in use for easy carrying and storing.
Very lightweight yet extra strong makes traveling and mobility very easy.
Zipper off the top for easy access, also has a zippered front door so your pet can walk in and out.
Great for indoors, outdoors, traveling, camping,and more!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
